reviews.review: que filme meu irmã, trabalho maravilhoso da marvel!!!
let the summer blockbuster movies begin
Action packed, humor filled and heat wrenching. 10 years did not disappoint.

Not bad not great. I think the issue is the avengers are just so boring. In this movie they bring everyone in, not just the core avengers (though no ant-man). This is the most Zack Snyder-ie Marvel movie ever. It's dark, light on jokes and depressing. After seeing it, didn't feel super compelled to see how this story resolves itself. 

Everyone was fine as usual, the cast was great. Also, the biggest surprise of all was CG villain didn't look like crap. It was amazing how good he looked. They even animated nape hair on Brolin. Maybe DC should hire these guys for their films. Even when the screen was littered with CG aliens it didn't look bad. Only time it was bad was with Thanos's acolytes were on screen, they clearly didn't get as much time and detail spent on them. 

The story was fine and it was nice to see a movie end on a downer that's also a blockbuster. Half of the universe gets destroyed, the lamer avengers including spider-man dies, hawkeye and and ant-man don't make an appearance, maybe they're dead too like Nick Fury in the post credit scene. Oh spoiler, Nick Fury PAGES Captain Marvel on a motorola looking pager with stuff half-assedly glued onto it to make it "sci-fi". You see her logo fill up the LCD on the pager which looked monochromatic like they were back then, and yet manages to magically display color. I guess they didn't think they could achieve the same effect leaving the Captain Marvel logo in teal-scale. 

Deaths include: Bucky, Gamora, Groot, Drax, Spider-man, Dr Strange, half-of-the-universe, Black Panther, Scarlet Witch, Vision

Living left: Rocket, Gamora's sister, Peter Quill/Star Lord, IronMan, Captain America, Hulk, Thor (he gets a badass axe from Peter Dinklage enlarged to a 20ft Dwarf, it cleaves Thanos), Warmachine. Black Widow.

*SPOILER WARNING AT THE END DONT READ IF U DONT WANT THE MOVIE TO BE SPOILED* 


Most of the movie was great really long but what made it bad was the ending, Heimdall should have had the soul stone and they shouldn't have  killed off half of the cast.
Last scene ruined the movie

It’s epic on all levels. The comedic elements are genuinely funny. The action grips and it doesn’t feel like there is too much is going on with too many characters. Yes, it is not a stand alone movie and you have to see the next one to make sense of it all and you feel emotions that are ignored but that’s sort of the point.
Pretty creative and how it should have done, not the way the other movies were made. Original ending and good use of characters.
Good job considering the number of iconic characters...Perhaps a little fine-tuning was needed for the first hour. Also, the humor was a bit much in one or two scenes- nothing terrible.
AMAZING. MIND-BOGGLING. aND EVEN MORE SURPRISING THAT I EXPECTED (WHICH IS SAYING A LOT).  oNLY THE RUSSO BROTHERS COULD'VE PULLED THIS OFF.
This is the best  comic book movie ever loved it
